title: Uncle Malaria - Heroin Overdrive
description:
Uncle Malaria - Heroin Overdrive

A collection of Heavy Metal Computer Rendered tracks. Most guitar was made with Fruity Loops Studio. Sequenced, Edited, and Mastered with Cool Edit Pro 2.5 and Adobe Audition 3.0. Some tracks mastered with BBE Sonic Maximizer.

01 - Gwen Stephanie - What are you waiting for (Uncle Malaria Mix)
A short and heavy death metal remix.
02 - Road of Glory
03 - Shadow Smoke
An extremely heavy instrumental meant for a video game soundtrack or show intro.
04 - Marvin Gaye - Sexual Healing (Uncle Malaria Mix)
A short and heavy death metal acid remix.
05 - Assault on Photon Bay
06 - Death of Anse
A reworking and metalified version of the Classic.
07 - The Lighthouse Ver 2 (By Uncle Carcus)
A remix of a Elevator From Hell track by Uncle Carcus.
08 - Super Smash
09 - Metal Devastation (ft. Uncle Carcus)
A bass heavy metal instrumental...crank the 60hz.
10 - Power Crusher
11 - White Water
An extremely heavy instrumental meant for a video game soundtrack or show intro.
12 - Black Mushrooms (ft. Uncle Carcus)
A funky acid metal track.
13 - Nova Rush
14 - The Wastelands (Mack the Knife Mix)
A remix of the jazz classic with the narrator from Fallout 2.
15 - Metal Devastation (The Case of Mike Merrick Mix)
Vocals are sampled from a 50s propaganda film called `Boys Beware`, this film was shown to school children to show them that Homosexuals are Murderous Pedophiles... Americans...

Uncle Malaria and Uncle Carcus are independant artists located in Southern Alberta.

If you enjoy these tracks, please feel free copy, distribute, remix, sample, etc. if you
give us credit, that's super, and if not, we don't care. We made these tracks as a hobbie.

All tracks are 32bit Wav mixed down to 320kbs CBR MP3.

We made these tracks with Cool Edit Pro 2.5, Adobe Audition 3.0, Reason, ReBirth, Fruity Loops, some Fractal Freeware, lots of VST and DirectX Plugins.
